overview: Emily Willis is stoked to get some good dick during her scene, but when she gets to set, the director says she's way too small! Bambino's pics of athletic hottie Kendra Spade twerking at the beach are so good, she agrees to go back to his place for a proper photo shoot. Damon Dice is used to hitting on hotties at the gym, but he's not used to the response he gets from badass blonde Mazzy Grace! Riley Star is taking her grandfather to a show...or at least, she will, if the bus ever comes. Elsa Jean couldn't be bothered with dudes her own age when she can have a DILF instead.
title: Pure 18 37
